title: How to make online classes more lively - Quora

response.answer_text: Being a student I recommend you to add a tone of sarcasm in your teaching, don’t teach like those boring teachers who just keep on explaining, take a break after every 15–20 minutes. This will keep learners engaged. While teaching online try to make beautiful slides containing multimedia content not only text! Also try to give real life examples wherever possible. I just listed all the points which i think a teacher can consider while trying to teach online. I hope my teachers also read this answer so that me and my classmates don’t have to suffer.

Virtual learning is the future of the education sector worldwide. Every education expert is suggesting to move in this direction because of the several benefits associated with it. You can ask supplementary questions via the chat box, this makes your classes more lively. Moreover, it can be watched multiple times. So it provides you the flexible schedule. Interaction can be among the students by way of question answers. I have heard that KSG is starting the online batch (KOL) from today itself for the duration of 10 months. Here we can earn our fee back because of the scholarship programme. Jai Hind!!

As a student I have noticed that because the classroom teachers dont have the habit of taking online classes most of them just read out from the ppts or textbook which not only bores the student but also they cannot learn anything from it . So I would suggest you can include some video in you presentation , can keep a small game session related to your subject like complete the formula , guess the answer which would create a sense of competition among students and would also engage them . Also you can see how other fellow teachers on youtube are teaching and can learn from them .This would surely make your class more engaging and lively . Please upvote if you found it useful :)

Teachers who are used to Classroom teaching may find it difficult to take online classes..I understand..But nothing else can be done other than upgrading ourselves..because this pandemic has made everything like that..
